name: MajorTransplant
title: Major Transplant
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Includes concepts that represent a procedure for a transplant of the heart, thymus, spleen, lung, esophagus, stomach, small intestine, large intestine, liver, pancreas, ovary, uterus, face, hand or pancreatic islet cells.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a transplant of the heart, thymus, spleen, lung, esophagus, stomach, small intestine, large intestine, liver, pancreas, ovary, uterus, face, hand or pancreatic islet cells.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent kidney transplants.)
